title: Boutique NSW South Coast Beachside Villas with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails & A$100 Dining Credit
description: Treat yourself to a relaxed stay at Bangalay Luxury Villas, a beautifully designed, nature-inspired Shoalhaven retreat in New South Wales, just steps from Seven Mile Beach. With each boutique villa reflecting the beauty of surrounding natural elements, an effortless mix of earthy tones and chic minimalism creates an intimate feel in a prime beachfront location. Rejuvenate with the sea breeze in the morning from your sun-filled outdoor deck, before heading out to explore the serene Shoalhaven Heads. Browse through handicrafts at vibrant south coast artisan markets, wander around the Shoalhaven Zoo for a hands-on experience for the kids, or venture to the Cambewarra Mountain lookout for panoramic vistas. Later, return to Bangalay Dining for sustainable dining showcasing local ingredients or laze on the resort's sun-soaked pool deck.
offer_address: 30 Staples St, Shoalhaven Heads, New South Wales 2535 Australia

title: French-Inspired Boutique Escape on Tasmaniaâ€™s South Coast
description:
Take a leisurely 20-minute drive from Hobart to embrace indulgence and romance at Villa Howden - a boutique hotel with 10 luxury suites located on the tranquil shores of North West Bay. Inspired by French elegance, Villa Howden blends the scenery and fresh produce of Tasmania with a distinctly European-style experience.

Relax and unwind in this charming retreat as you enjoy daily a la carte breakfast, a buy-one-get-one-free three-course dining experience with a glass of wine, a  bottle of sparkling on arrival and a guaranteed 12pm late checkout.

title: Boutique NSW South Coast Villas with Daily Breakfast, Cocktails & A$100 Dining Credit
description:
Succumb to coastal chill with a relaxed stay at Bangalay Luxury Villas, a beautifully designed, nature-inspired Shoalhaven retreat, just two hours from Sydney and steps from the shores of Seven Mile Beach. With each boutique villa designed to reflect the beauty of surrounding natural elements, expect to find an effortless mix of earthy tones and chic minimalism that creates an intimate feel. A prime beachfront location, heated outdoor pool and mouthwatering creations on offer at Bangalay Dining ensure each day of your escape will be utterly stress-free.

Rejuvenate with the sea breeze in the morning from your sun-filled outdoor deck, before heading out to explore the serene Shoalhaven Heads. Browse through handicrafts at vibrant south coast artisan markets, wander around the Shoalhaven Zoo for a hands-on experience for the kids, or venture to the Cambewarra Mountain lookout for panoramic vistas. After a long day, relax with handcrafted cocktails in the rays of a spectacular sunset.
offer_address: 30 Staples St, Shoalhaven Heads, New South Wales 2535 Australia

title: NSW South Coast: Shoalhaven Heads Villa Retreat
description:
Succumb to coastal luxury and architectural splendour with a relaxed stay at Bangalay Luxury Villas, a beautifully designed, nature-inspired Shoalhaven retreat, just two hours from Sydney and steps from the shores of Seven Mile Beach. Set among the pristine backdrop of coastal national park and the sweeping green of Shoalhaven Heads Golf Club, this refined escape promises absolute relaxation and native-infused cuisine while exuding an ethos of wellness and sustainability. Follow the sun-drenched boardwalk and slip into the sparkling pool framed by breezy gum trees, flow through to the idyllic gardens for a private yoga session or retreat to your villa and allow an expert masseuse to soothe your skin with organic, plant-based body oils.

When it comes to refuelling, onsite restaurant Bangalay Dining does not disappoint. Showcasing locally foraged farm-to-fork produce with a native focus, this luxe eatery caters to a range of dine-in, takeaway and cook-at-home options, from gourmet picnic hampers and tasting menus to three-course dinners ready to finesse in the privacy of your villa.
offer_address: 30 Staples St, Shoalhaven Heads, New South Wales 2535 Australia
